Huntington_Park.Metropolitan Building (Los Angeles):
This list of tallest buildings in Los Angeles ranks skyscrapers in Los Angeles, California, by height. The tallest building in Los Angeles is the Wilshire Grand Center, which became the tallest building in 2016.
The Wilshire Grand also stands as the tallest building in the state of California, tallest building west of the Mississippi, and the 9th-tallest building in the United States.
